thread.title: Feeling at home in Rome
thread.title_full: Feeling at home in Rome - Review of The Inn At The Roman Forum, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: JoannaStar
title: Feeling at home in Rome
text: We really enjoyed a three day visit to Rome at this small luxury hotel. The location is great for visiting anyhing in the center of Rome, as it is very close to some of the greatest sights. The hotel itself is on a very beautiful, quiet street. The staff we met - Alex, Valentina, Barbara are all eager to help in any way possible, we really enjoyed their advice and chats. Don't miss the breakfast on the rooftop - great quality of ingredients and a superb view. All in all, an excellent stay! Ps must visit to the "dungeons".
